text: Hey y’all, if you’re anything like me, you didn’t answer the KYC question yesterday. Maybe you thought it was dumb or maybe you thought you would get back to it later and didn’t. If you’re in the first group, I’m not offended, but if you’re in the second group, this is your reminder! I’d love if everyone could take a second and really think about what you do here. Beyond what your job title says you do, I want to know what you _really_ do, for many of you it’s much more than what your job title says OR it is part of your job description and I just don’t know what all your job entails. Anyway, I think it’d be great to bring to light what everyone does around here every day. Feel free to toot your own horn a little bit!

Whoo who! we have a quorum for The Pitch class! I will be sending those who signed up an email with the date for the class and some homework! Looking forward to seeing the final graduation Pecha Kuchas!

attachments.title: Oskar Fischinger’s 117th Birthday

text: Anyone want to help me clean up some comments left on the sidewalk after work?
miguel: I'd be glad to help. Let me know when.
<!channel> FYI Elk Collective will be taking photos in stone, steel and the 4th floor kitchen area for their portfolio at 6pm today. lmk if you have concerns!
